Review_Text: It's envolves soccer and ATLETICO MINEIRO, one of the greatest brazilian clubs of all time, yeah. But it is mostly about devotion, resistence and what drives us.AMAZING.

The history of the most beloved football club in Minas Gerais state is full of perseverance, injustice, strength, faith and glory. Football has the power to bring people together, and the community created by Clube Atlético Mineiro was strengthened in the fight on and off the field.The documentary shows that it is in the diversity of those who love Galo that the fans gain the strength to support the team in any scenario. The ironic parallels throughout Atlético's history make us wonder if everything in sport is in fact just a
coincidence, or great moments are ruled by fate.Brazilian football fans are no doubt passionate about their teams. And Atleticanos are no different, it is shown that they not only support their club, they are loyal, devoted and above everything believers.
